messages.content: what are the medications being used

Based on the medical history document for Rajesh Malhotra, he is currently taking the following medications:

1. Ashwagandha (Supplement) - Occasional use, as needed 
2. Multivitamin (Supplement) - 1 tablet daily

The document indicates that Rajesh is not taking any prescription medications at present. He was diagnosed with Stage 2 Hypertension in April 2025 and has been undergoing a trial of lifestyle modifications to manage his condition before starting medication.
